p: To validate the RNA-seq results, quantitative real-time polymerase chain reaction (qRT-qPCR) assays were performed for four highly expressed selected genes and a comparison made between the results in the treated and control samples. For S. pistillata, small heat shock protein and calmodulin genes, which were up- and down-regulated respectively, after 30 °C treatment, were selected. For B. europaea, we selected ferritin and nitric oxide synthase, which were up-regulated after 29 °C treatment.
